title: Hawaiian/Polynesian style font
content: Does anyone know the name of the hawaiian/polynesian style font.
author: Susiequs

comments.content:
FontHouse has the Tiki Type package:

[http://www.houseind.com/fonts/tikitype/viewfonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150124044815/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/tikitype/viewfonts "http://www.houseind.com/fonts/tikitype/viewfonts")

Churchward Type has some faces based on Maori (New Zealand) art:

[http://new.myfonts.com/foundry/Churchward\_Type/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150124044815/http:/new.myfonts.com/foundry/Churchward_Type/ "http://new.myfonts.com/foundry/Churchward\_Type/")
